1322.content:
*Author's Note: I changed the story, so it's not like in 5D's. In this story, the Duel Academy has dorms again, but it isn't divided. Akiza, Leo, and Luna are in the same dorm.*

After finishing studying, Akiza returned to her dorm that she shared with the twins, still in her school uniform. She returned to see Leo, the boy twin, sitting on his bed with only his underwear on. He was writing something down. "Hey Akiza," Leo greeted. "Hey Leo," Akiza replied, "Whatcha doing?" "I'm writing up a plan," Leo said. "A plan for what?" Akiza asked curiously. "I'll show you," Leo said, "But for now, lie down on your bed." The room was quite spacious, and each person had a normal sized bed of their own. From left to right, it was Luna's bed, then Leo's and Akiza's. Akiza did as she was told and lied down on her bed, beside Leo's. Then, Leo pressed a button and two mechanical arms held her arms and hips tightly. "Leo, what are you-" "Shh, I'm showing you what I'm going to do," Leo interrupted Akiza. He reached into his pocket and threw some pills into Akiza's mouth. She chewed and swallowed the pills to avoid choking. "What were those?" Akiza asked. "I think those were pills to make anything you eat unharmful, make you unable to scream, and disable your psychic powers". Akiza tried to scream, and, it was true. She couldn't scream. She also tried to summon any monster that could kill Leo easily. No use.

1551211.content:
You giggle in excitement as you heard the bell ring. You put on a shirt and a pair of boxers and went to the door. Yuzu Hiragi was assigned to you to work on a project as a pair, and she is at your doorstep right now. However, what you have in plan today doesn't include finishing the project...
"Hello Terry," Yuzu said as she smiled nervously. You were never popular in school due to your weird nature, and other kids tended to avoid you. Having to work with you alone could be quite unnerving to anyone in your class. "Yes, hello, Yuzu," you said as you gestured for her to come in, "Please, come in." She walked into your small apartment that you lived alone in. "Wow, do you live here alone?" she asked as she looked around. There wasn't much to see, just trash, worn clothes and your bed, a chair, a couch and a table. "Yup, it's not much, but it's all I have," you said, "Make yourself at home."
"So..." Yuzu said after sitting down on the couch, "What are we going to do for the project?" You snickered as she asked that. "Oh, we're not doing a project today," you said as you approached her. Yuzu was starting to get nervous. "W-what are we going to do?" she asked with a serious face, preparing to defend herself. "This!" you said as you pounced at her and... Pushed your butt into her face!? "Mmph!?" Yuzu exclaimed with your boxed clad butt on her face. Wiping was never high on your priorities, and Yuzu was receiving the full consequences of that. You moaned as deadly farts were ripped into Yuzu's face. She had never smelled anything as vile. Yuzu was close to passing out, when you stood up, giving her fresh air. "Come on, it's only farts," you grinned as you grabbed her by both wrists and pushed her onto your bed. Her eyes were wide with fear as you sat on her face again, this time with your bare butt! Her nose is now mere millimeters from your dirty hole. The smell was unbearable. You grunted as... PPPPPPRRRRAAAAABBBBBBTTTTTTTTTTT!!! A massive fart assaulted Yuzu's senses! Yuzu had to smell all the horrible stench as you...
